statements.statement: CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_airport_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airport USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_landmark_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.landmark USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_hotel_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.hotel USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_airline_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.airline USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_sample_route_primary ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.sample.route USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
CREATE PRIMARY INDEX def_primary on `@BUCKET_NAME@` USING GSI WITH {"defer_build":true}
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`airline`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'airline' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`airport`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'airport' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`hotel`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'hotel' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`landmark`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'landmark' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`.`sample`.`route`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = 'route' AND state = 'deferred'))
BUILD INDEX ON `@BUCKET_NAME@`((SELECT RAW name FROM system:indexes WHERE keyspace_id = '@BUCKET_NAME@' AND state = 'deferred'))
